    Why you'll love it here

    • Compensation & Rewards

      Competitive pay, equity, referral/peer bonuses, and monthly recruiting raffle prizes

    • Rest & Relaxation

      Paid holidays, unlimited time off, and six weeks of paid parental leave

    • Healthcare Coverage

      Premiums covered for you, your dependents, and your spouse or domestic partner

    • Meals on Us

      Catered in-office lunch and dinner on weekdays and a fully stocked kitchen

    • Easy to get to

      Convenient office location, free transit card, and secure bike storage

    • Brand New Gear

      A shiny MacBook Pro or Air, a Thunderbolt Display, and any other gear you need

    • Gym Membership

      Free Crunch Fitness membership or a health and wellness subsidy

    • We have fun

      Frequent team outings, game nights, pool, video games, and a ping pong robot
